meanings.sent1: The consummative moment of the play was when the hero saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The final scene of the movie was truly consummative, tying up all loose ends.
meanings.sent3: The cake's consummative decoration made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her consummative speech left the audience in awe, perfectly summing up the event.
meanings.sent5: The consummative sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues, signaling the end of the day.

meanings.definition: Achieving the highest degree of excellence or perfection
meanings.sent1: The artist's consummative painting was displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: Her performance was consummative, earning her a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The chef's consummative dish was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The consummative dance routine left the judges speechless with its perfection.
meanings.sent5: The team's consummative victory was celebrated by fans far and wide.

meanings.sent1: The consummative touch of adding a bow to the gift made it perfect.
meanings.sent2: The last piece of the puzzle was the consummative element needed to finish it.
meanings.sent3: The consummative handshake sealed the deal between the two business partners.
meanings.sent4: The consummative key unlocked the mysterious chest, revealing its contents.
meanings.sent5: The consummative moment of silence marked the end of the emotional ceremony.
